com.communote.server.core.common.ldap

Class LdapAttributesMapper<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.communote.server.core.common.ldap.LdapAttributesMapper<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - the target class this mapper can map to
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    LdapGroupAttributesMapper, LdapUserAttributesMapper

    public abstract class LdapAttributesMapper<T>
extends Object
    Generic mapper for LDAP attributes to Communote counterparts.
    Author:
    Communote GmbH - http://www.communote.com/

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      LdapAttributesMapper(Map<String,String> mapping)
      Creates a mapper based on a mapping from Communote attribute names to LDAP attribute names.
      LdapAttributesMapper(String mapping)
      Convenience constructor to initialize the mapper from a string based mapping definition.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      protected String getAttributeValue(Attributes attributes, String ldapAttributeName)
      Returns the value for the named LDAP attribute.
      protected String getAttributeValueForKenmeiAttributeName(String dn, Attributes attributes, String communoteAttributeName)
      Similar to getAttributeValue(Attributes, String) but expects a Communote attribute name which will be automatically mapped to the LDAP attribute name.
      abstract String[] getBinaryLdapAttributeName()
      Returns an array of names of mapped LDAP attributes that are binary.

      Returns the LDAP attribute name for a Communote attribute.
      String[] getMappedLdapAttributeNames()
      Returns the names of the mapped LDAP attributes.
      String getMappingAsString()
      Returns the mapping of the mapper as string in the form communoteAttribute1=ldapAttribute1,communoteAttribute2=ldapAttribute2
      protected abstract Set<String> getRequiredAttributeNames()
      Returns the subset with required Communote attribute names the mapper can map.
      protected abstract Set<String> getSupportedAttributeNames()
      Returns the Kenmei attribute names the mapper can map.
      protected void init(Map<String,String> mapping)
      Initializes the mapper and validates that all required properties are contained in the mapping.

      Returns whether a Communote attribute is mapped to an LDAP attribute.
      abstract T mapAttributes(String dn, Attributes ldapAttributes)
      Maps the LDAP attributes to the generic type.

    • Constructor Detail

      • LdapAttributesMapper

        public LdapAttributesMapper(Map<String,String> mapping)
                     throws LdapAttributeMappingException
        Creates a mapper based on a mapping from Communote attribute names to LDAP attribute names.
        Parameters:
        mapping - a mapping from Communote attribute names to LDAP attribute names
        Throws:
        LdapAttributeMappingException - if an attribute is not supported or a required attribute is missing

      • LdapAttributesMapper

        public LdapAttributesMapper(String mapping)
                     throws LdapAttributeMappingException
        Convenience constructor to initialize the mapper from a string based mapping definition.
        Parameters:
        mapping - a mapping in the form communoteAttribute1=ldapAttribute1,communoteAttribute2=ldapAttribute2
        Throws:
        LdapAttributeMappingException - if an attribute is not supported or a required attribute is missing

    • Method Detail

      • getAttributeValue

        protected String getAttributeValue(Attributes attributes,
                                   String ldapAttributeName)
                            throws LdapAttributeMappingException
        Returns the value for the named LDAP attribute. If the LDAP attribute is not contained or the attribute has no value null is returned. If the attribute has more than one value only the first will be returned.
        Parameters:
        attributes - the attributes from which the value should be extracted
        ldapAttributeName - the name of the attribute in LDAP
        Returns:
        the value converted to string
        Throws:
        LdapAttributeMappingException - if there was an error while retrieving the value

      • getAttributeValueForKenmeiAttributeName

        protected String getAttributeValueForKenmeiAttributeName(String dn,
                                                         Attributes attributes,
                                                         String communoteAttributeName)
                                                  throws LdapAttributeMappingException
        Similar to getAttributeValue(Attributes, String) but expects a Communote attribute name which will be automatically mapped to the LDAP attribute name. If the named attribute is a required attribute the value must be non-null otherwise an exception is thrown.
        Parameters:
        dn - Needed for logging.
        attributes - the attributes from which the value should be extracted
        communoteAttributeName - the name of the Communote attribute. The attribute must be one of the getSupportedAttributeNames().
        Returns:
        the value converted to string
        Throws:
        LdapAttributeMappingException - if there was an error while retrieving the value or the attribute name is not supported or the attribute is required but did not return a value

      • getBinaryLdapAttributeName

        public abstract String[] getBinaryLdapAttributeName()
        Returns an array of names of mapped LDAP attributes that are binary.
        Returns:
        the array of attribute names or null if there are no binary attributes

      • getLdapAttributName

        public String getLdapAttributName(String name)
        Returns the LDAP attribute name for a Communote attribute.
        Parameters:
        name - the name
        Returns:
        the mapped attribute name or null if the attribute is not mapped

      • getMappedLdapAttributeNames

        public String[] getMappedLdapAttributeNames()
        Returns the names of the mapped LDAP attributes.
        Returns:
        the names of the LDAP attributes. Can be empty if nothing is mapped

      • getMappingAsString

        public String getMappingAsString()
        Returns the mapping of the mapper as string in the form communoteAttribute1=ldapAttribute1,communoteAttribute2=ldapAttribute2
        Returns:
        the mapping as string

      • getRequiredAttributeNames

        protected abstract Set<String> getRequiredAttributeNames()
        Returns the subset with required Communote attribute names the mapper can map.
        Returns:
        Kenmei attribute names that are required

      • getSupportedAttributeNames

        protected abstract Set<String> getSupportedAttributeNames()
        Returns the Kenmei attribute names the mapper can map.
        Returns:
        the Kenmei attribute names the mapper can map

      • init

        protected void init(Map<String,String> mapping)
             throws LdapAttributeMappingException
        Initializes the mapper and validates that all required properties are contained in the mapping.
        Parameters:
        mapping - the mapping of Kenmei attribute names to LDAP counterparts to validate
        Throws:
        LdapAttributeMappingException - if an attribute is not supported or a required attribute is missing

      • isKenmeiAttributeMapped

        public boolean isKenmeiAttributeMapped(String communoteAttributeName)
        Returns whether a Communote attribute is mapped to an LDAP attribute.
        Parameters:
        communoteAttributeName - the Communote attribute to check
        Returns:
        true if it is mapped, false otherwise

      • mapAttributes

        public abstract T mapAttributes(String dn,
                                Attributes ldapAttributes)
                         throws LdapAttributeMappingException
        Maps the LDAP attributes to the generic type.
        Parameters:
        dn - the DN of the element providing the attributes
        ldapAttributes - The ldap attributes.
        Returns:
        the target object created from the attributes
        Throws:
        LdapAttributeMappingException - if the mapping failed
